sentence.Network_en: You promise me that Black Scorpions will never come back to Lanzhou.
sentence.Network_cn: 你保证黑蝎子永远不再踏上兰州的土地.

sentence.Network_en: You Scorpions are rather secretive about your likes and dislikes.
sentence.Network_cn: 天蝎:蝎子是如此的神秘,你的喜好很难被别人洞悉.

sentence.Network_en: Scorpions and sandhill cranes, for instance, dance to impress.
sentence.Network_cn: 比如, 雄性蝎子和沙丘鹤就用舞蹈吸引异性.

entry.def: A scorpion is a small creature which looks like a large insect. Scorpions have a long curved tail, and some of them are poisonous.

auth_sentence.content: There were vampire bats and scorpions and anacondas.
auth_sentence.res_content: There were vampire bats and scorpions and anacondas.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There were vampire bats and scorpions and anacondas.
